title: Heiko von der Leyen
summary:
Heiko Echter von der Leyen (born 2 June 1955 in Hanover) is a German physician, by birth member of the von der Leyen family, which belonged to the German nobility. 
Von der Leyen is married to the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen.
Since December 2020, he is Medical Director of the company Orgenesis which specialises in cell and gene therapies.
